text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: Acer Predator 15 G9-591-70VM 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It overheats frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The screen brightness has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the Refurbished: Acer Predator 15 G9-591-70VM 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It overheats frequently when playing Valorant, and the performance throttles significantly. The speakers has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the Refurbished: Acer Predator 15 G9-591-70VM 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 6th Gen 6700HQ (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970M 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the trackpad feels cheap. Performance in content creation and gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Performance in AAA gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.
